text_logic_form: The line segment $LM$ is the hypotenuse of the triangle $JLK$.
Find the length of the altitude of the triangle $JLK$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line segment $LM$ is the hypotenuse of the triangle $JLK$.
Find the length of the altitude of the triangle $JLK$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line segment $JM$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line segment $KM$ is $16$ units.
The point $M$ lies on the line segment $JK$.
The line segment $KM$ is perpendicular to the line segment $LM$.
The line segment $LM$ is perpendicular to the line segment $LK$.
line_instances: There are line segments $JK$, $JL$, $JM$, $KM$, $LK$, and $LM$, forming the triangle $JLK$.
The line segment $KM$ is the altitude of the triangle $JLK$.
